Install¶

Instructions for install TEN

Contents

  • Requirements
  • Install TEN

Requirements¶

You need to have the following software properly installed in order to run TEN:

  • Python 2.7, 3.2 or above.
  • Pip
  • A working MPI implementation, preferably supporting MPI-3 and built with shared/dynamic libraries (ex. OpenMPI)

The other depence (Numpy, MPI4Py and Matplotlib) are going to install via pip.

Install TEN¶

The easiest way to install TEN is using pip:

pip install -U ten

But also, you can get the last version from the sourcce code repo:

cd ~
git clon https://github.com/pewen/ten.git
cd ten
python setup.py install
